reviewText: I have ordered other DVDs that said they would not play on American DVD players and they DID play on American DVD players.  Alas, I should have believed the writing with the DVD that this would not play on an American DVD.  I was sick.  We love allo allo and wanted to see these two DVDs.  I was able to find a DVD that WOULD play on an American DVD player so we got to see Season 8.

If I want to laugh myself  crazy for an hour, I turn this on, perfect combo of fun and slapstick
I think they are Britain's 3 Stooges reincarnated LOL
